import { useContext, useEffect } from "react"; import { KeranjangContext } from "../../contexts/keranjangContext"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { API } from "../../config/api"; import { useQuery } from "react-query"; import { Card } from "../../compnents/Card"; import Heromenu from "../../compnents/hero/Heromenu"; import { TextLoading } from "../../compnents/card/CardLoading"; import "./assets/index.css"; function Restaurant() { const [state, dispatch] = useContext(KeranjangContext); let { id } = useParams(); const addProductToCart = (data) => { dispatch({ type: "ADD_CART", payload: data, }); }; const { data: bookData, error: bookError, loading: bookLoading, refetch: bookRefetch, } = useQuery("booksCache", async () => { return API.get(`/products/${id}`); }); return ( <>
